sentences.sContent: Their principle function is production of type III collagen, elastin, and proteoglycans of the extracellular matrix of the alveolar septa.
sentences.sContent_eng: Their principle function is production of type III collagen, elastin, and proteoglycans of the extracellular matrix of the alveolar septa.
sentences.sCn: 其主要的功能是产生III型胶原，弹性蛋白和肺泡隔细胞外基质中的蛋白多糖。

sentences.sContent: The effects of quartz on membranous fluidity labelled with DPH and ANS and the production of oxygen free radicals of alveolar macrophages were studied in vitro.
sentences.sContent_eng: The effects of quartz on membranous fluidity labelled with DPH and ANS and the production of oxygen free radicals of alveolar macrophages were studied in vitro.
sentences.sCn: 采用体外细胞实验方法，观察了石英尘对DPH和ANS标记的肺胞巨噬细胞膜流动性和荧光性质的影响，同时测定了肺泡巨噬细胞活性氧的产生。

words.tran: [生物] 蜂窝状的；有肺泡的

trans.tranOther: of, relating to, or resembling an alveolus
a  consonant  sound such as /  t  / or /  d  / that you make by putting the end of your tongue behind your upper front teeth
